Instruction: Puncture the eggplant several times with a fork and then place it on a baking sheet.
Roast eggplant in the preheated oven until the skin is charred and the eggplant is soft, approximately 45 minutes. Allow the eggplant to cool for 5 to 10 minutes until it can be easily handled.
Chop the eggplant into bite-sized pieces.
Process eggplant in a food processor until smooth. Gradually beat in oil until well combined, then add yogurt and salt. Mix in chopped onion.
Grill the eggplant if preferred instead of baking it in the oven.
Do not substitute the electric mixer with a blender for step 4.
You can substitute vegetable oil for canola oil when making this dish.
